mapper.insert: insert into product (pro_email, pro_nick_name, pro_title, pro_content, pro_price, pro_category, pro_menu, pro_sido, pro_sigg, pro_emd) values(#{proEmail}, #{proNickName}, #{proTitle}, #{proContent}, #{proPrice}, #{proCategory}, #{proMenu}, #{proSido}, #{proSigg}, #{proEmd})
mapper.select: select count(pro_bno) from product where pro_category = 'joongo' AND pro_is_del = 'N'
select * from product where pro_bno = #{proBno} AND pro_is_del = 'N'
mapper.update: update product set pro_is_del = 'Y' where pro_bno = #{proBno}
update product set pro_read_cnt = pro_read_cnt + #{i} where pro_bno = #{bno}
update product as p set pro_file_cnt = (select count(p.pro_bno) from product_file as file where file.bno = p.pro_bno)
update product as p set pro_like_cnt = (select count(p.pro_bno) from product_like as li where li.li_bno = p.pro_bno AND li.li_status = 1)
update product set pro_like_cnt = pro_like_cnt + #{i} where pro_bno = #{livo.liBno}
mapper.select: select count(pro_bno) from product where pro_category = #{category} AND pro_is_del = 'N'

select * from product where pro_category = #{category} AND pro_is_del = 'N'
order by pro_re_at desc limit #{pgvo.pageStart}, #{pgvo.qty}

choose.otherwise: AND (pro_title like concat('%',#{pgvo.keyword},'%') OR pro_nick_name like concat('%',#{pgvo.keyword},'%') OR pro_email like concat('%',#{pgvo.keyword},'%') OR pro_content like concat('%',#{pgvo.keyword},'%'))
